title: WATCH | Armed robbers make off with laptop, cellphones and cash from Boksburg cellphone store
text:
Police are searching for six suspects involved in an armed robbery at a Boksburg cellphone store that occurred in the early hours of Monday morning. (Screenshot)

Police are searching for six suspects involved in an armed robbery at a Boksburg cellphone store that took place in the early hours of Monday morning. Watch.

CCTV footage of the incident shows four men and two women, some of them armed, stealing goods from the store.

Initially, three suspects posed as customers before the remaining three stormed the store with firearms.

According to police spokesperson Brigadier Mathapelo Peters, the suspects robbed employees in the store of their belongings.

"The suspects also took a laptop, cellphones and a cash amount and made off in a silver grey motor vehicle," said Peters in a statement.

A case of business robbery was opened at the Boksburg North police station with no arrests made at this stage.
